name: Tales of an Asteroid Junkrat
description:
You are an Asteroid Junkrat making a living doing rescue operations in the asteroid belt, but who has the time or money to put together a real ship these days? Throwing something together from scrap in 1 minute will have to do!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Lost and Found".

How to play:

Build a junk ship out of scrap parts, drag and drop parts from the conveyor belt in the hanger. Be quick as you don't have much time!

Parts:

  • Regular blocks: connective tissue of your ship they give your more hull integrity
  •  Thrusters: Push your ship around in space, make sure you have some thrusters on the back and both sides so you can steer
  • Lasers: useful for destroying asteroids
  • Auto Turret: protect your ship automatically against incoming asteroids
  • Shield: Create a protective bubble around your ship
  • Missile: A powerful weapon which can destroy multiple asteroids

Once you've thrown a ship together try to survive! Get points by picking up citizens and space sheep, arrows will guide you to them.

Controls:

Building:

  • Click on parts on the conveyor then on blue squares to place
  • Mouse scroll to rotate the part you are holding

Advanced: Hold left-ctrl and use mouse wheel to change the control of thrusters. 

  • W - arrow points up
  • A - arrow points left
  • D - arrow points right

Flying:

  •  WASD to use thrusters
  • Space to fire lasers
  • Shift to fire missiles
